title: Goerli: snapshot.store() segfault

any idea what's causing this? I am running into this problem as well.

No, we don’t have ideas about it. Maybe it’s write to journal after closing it, but no evidence.

anything I can provide to help tracking this down? I did a build from last [beta](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/tag/v2022.04.02). Rinkeby and Goerli crashes every time I start up, either fresh or from a previous sync. mainnet is totally fine.
@drunkirishcoder please retry on the latest alpha and see if it persists
I and all my team synced goerli just fine on the latest release w/o this issue. Closing for now, if it repeats on the latest release @drunkirishcoder feel free to reopen/comment.
